import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../Style/Work.scss"; export default ({ backgroundColor, fontColor, Index, Title, Date, Tech, demoLink, githubLink, Description, Images, }) => { const [active, setActive] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { setInterval(() => { setActive("--active"); }, 310); console.log("Work page UseEffect"); }, []); return (
